description: The Department of National Defense (DND) seeks to acquire the following items:
full_summary:
### Request for Proposal (RFP): TETRAFLUOROETHANE

#### Announcement Date: May 10, 2023

This RFP notice was originally published on the Canadabuys Supplier Portal and underwent two amendments, both of which are attached below for reference.

#### Tender Details

*   **Project Title**: Procurement of TETRAFLUOROETHANE
*   **Project Reference Number**: W8482-241562/A
*   **Request for Proposal (RFP) Type**: Lowest Price Tender (Competitive - Open Bidding)
*   **Deadline for Submissions**: June 9, 2023 at 14:00 EST

#### Request Details

The National Defence Department has invited bids for the procurement of TETRAFLUOROETHANE with the following requirements:

*   **Item 1:**
    *   **Description**: TETRAFLUOROETHANE
    *   **Quantity**: 73 CY (units)
    *   **Location**: Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Halifax, Nova Scotia
    *   **Specifications**: GSIN: 6830, NSN: 21-9201591, SUVA-134A (DUPONT CANADA INC) or FREON 134A (THE CHEMOURS CO FC LLC)
*   **Item 2:**
    *   **Description**: TETRAFLUOROETHANE
    *   **Quantity**: 60 CY (units)
    *   **Location**: Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Esquimalt, British Columbia
    *   **Specifications**: GSIN: 6830, NSN: 21-9201591, SUVA-134A (DUPONT CANADA INC) or FREON 134A (THE CHEMOURS CO FC LLC)

Bidders are required to submit prices in Canadian dollars. Equivalent or substitute products are allowed, and it is mandatory to indicate the brand name, model, and/or Part Number and the National Stock Number (NSN) of the proposed product. Preference will be given to Canadian goods and/or services. All requested documents are in English and French. 

Contact Information
Matthew Johnston
matthew.johnston2@forces.gc.ca
(819) 939-3636

Please note that the tender is now closed. Opportunities for future supply are available via the Canadabuys portal: [www.canadabuys.ca
